title: 命令方块问题
author: qq1438255191
txt_content:
如何才能用命令方块做到
当玩家站在水里时，会给玩家一个中毒的效果，如果他身上穿着一个叫防污外套的皮革套就不会中毒

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
单次执行
/scoreboard objectives add armor dummy
/scoreboard players add @a armor 0

循环执行：
/scoreboard players set @a armor 0
/scoreboard players set @a armor 1 {Inventory:[{Slot:102b,id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"防污外套"}}}]}
/execute @a[score_armor_min=1,score_armor=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ water 0 effect @p 19 5 1

刚刚指令有误，已修改

replies.author: 我chao爱MC
replies.txt_content:
版本:1.9
高频:
scoreboard players tag @a remove haveqw
连锁:
scoreboard players tag @a add haveqw {ArmorItems:[2:{id:"leather_chestplate",tag:{display:{Name:"去污外套"}}}]}
连锁:
execute @a[tag=!haveqw] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:water 0 summon ThrownPotion ~ ~ ~ {Potion:{idminecraft:potion:,Damage:0,Count:1,tag:
{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:19,Amplifier:0,Duration:1}}}

replies.txt_content:
先输入 /scoreboard objectives add wu dummy复制代码然后高频激活这些指令
/scoreboard playsers set @a wu 0
/execute @a[score_wu=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ water 0 /effect @p minecraft:poison 1 1
